name: Home (itch) (sohakes)
description:
I didn't have time for the jam, but I tried learning something.

Move with arrow keys, get money by pressing space on the bottom left corner of the house, and buy stuff in the phone. You can't interact with anything other than the phone and the bottom left. All the menu options are click only.

I didn't sort the Z indexes of the tilesets, so they get above the characters.

Credits for the graphics: https://limezu.itch.io/moderninteriors

My little cousin saw the game and suggested the name "Home". He is learning english :).
